input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Tie Bar"
Reference Product Name: "Non-Iron Dress Shirt"
Reference Product Description:
Meet your new wardrobe staple. This must have textured solid dress shirt is perfect for any occasion, keeping you looking your absolute best at work and on the weekends. Available in trim fit and standard fit. Need help finding your shirt size? Check out our Shirt Size Guide for the perfect fit.
Collar Style: Semi-spread. A popular collar style that has a wider spread between the collar points to accommodate the widest range of tie knots. Also the best collar type to dress down and wear without a tie.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Stretch Supima Cotton Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo'
  - Name='J.Crew Men's Classic Flex Shirt'
  - Name='Thomas Mason for J.Crew Men's Washed Cotton Poplin Shirt'
  - Name='BANANA REPUBLIC Men Fitted Italy Cotton Long Sleeve Dress Shirt - Large 16 | Blue | Classic | Embroidered | Non-Iron | Point | 100% Cotton'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Geo Print Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Classic Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's White Grid Check Non Iron Standard Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Regular Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Michael Kors Men's Regular Fit Airsoft Non Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Calvin Klein Men's Steel Stretch Slim Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Tommy Hilfiger Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Soft Wash Tailored Slim Fit'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Cotton Blend Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Striped Grant Fit Non Iron Button Up Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Long Sleeve Button Down Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Classic-Fit Dress Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Standard Fit Non Iron Button Up Shirt'
  - Name='Banana Republic Men's Dress Shirt'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Big & Tall Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This is a non-iron dress shirt similar in purpose and fabric, differing mainly by fit (Big & Tall) and inclusion of stretch, very relevant to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Regular Fit Non-Iron Stretch Supima Cotton Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Identical category as non-iron dress shirt with similar fabric and fit options, directly comparable to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Brooks Brothers Men's Stretch Supima Cotton Non-Iron Oxford Polo
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While non-iron and made of similar fabric, the polo style is sportier and less formal than a dress shirt, so less relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: J.Crew Men's Classic Flex Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A dress shirt likely with some stretch (flex), but without mention of non-iron; relevant but less so due to unknown fabric treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Thomas Mason for J.Crew Men's Washed Cotton Poplin Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Dress shirt made of cotton poplin but 'washed' implies not non-iron; similar category but less relevant due to different fabric finish.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: BANANA REPUBLIC Men Fitted Italy Cotton Long Sleeve Dress Shirt - Large 16 | Blue | Classic | Embroidered | Non-Iron | Point | 100% Cotton
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron long sleeve cotton dress shirt with a classic fit and point collar, very relevant though collar style differs from semi-spread.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Non-Iron Stretch Geo Print Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with stretch, though printed pattern and unknown collar style reduce relevancy slightly compared to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic shirt designation lacks specifics about fit, fabric, or non-iron feature, so moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Classic Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit dress shirt likely similar in construction to the reference, though no explicit non-iron claim lowers the score slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's White Grid Check Non Iron Standard Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron standard fit dress shirt matches closely to the reference product's features and intent.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Regular Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular fit dress shirt relevant but missing confirmation about non-iron treatment.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt, directly comparable to the reference product in function and feature set.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Michael Kors Men's Regular Fit Airsoft Non Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Regular fit non-iron dress shirt with performance fabric (airsoft), closely related to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Joseph Abboud Men's Modern Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Wrinkle-resistant dress shirt shares some characteristics but wrinkle-resistant may differ from non-iron treatment; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Calvin Klein Men's Steel Stretch Slim Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit with stretch, but no explicit non-iron mention; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Tommy Hilfiger Men's Slim Fit Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit non-iron dress shirt matching the reference productâ€™s key features and intended use.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Charles Tyrwhitt Men's Cutaway Collar Non-Iron Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron dress shirt with slightly different collar style but otherwise very relevant to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Soft Wash Tailored Slim Fit
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Soft wash suggests not non-iron; tailored slim fit shirt relevant but fabric treatment reduces relevancy.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Cotton Blend Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit dress shirt made of cotton blend; relevant in shape and type but no non-iron feature noted.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim-Fit Wrinkle-Resistant Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim-fit wrinkle-resistant dress shirt is close but wrinkle-resistant is not necessarily non-iron, lowering relevancy slightly.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Striped Grant Fit Non Iron Button Up Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-iron button-up with Grant fit, likely a dress shirt; stripes are a minor difference, overall relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Slim Fit Long Sleeve Button Down Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Slim fit long sleeve button-down dress shirt; button-down collar style not specified but generally less formal; moderately relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Classic-Fit Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Classic fit dress shirt with similar construction, no mention of non-iron; fairly relevant.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Standard Fit Non Iron Button Up Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Standard fit non-iron button-up shirt likely a dress shirt and closely related in features to the reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Banana Republic Men's Dress Shirt
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Generic dress shirt description lacks specifics on fit or non-iron treatment, somewhat relevant.
